DOC.brief_summary: Patients currently receiving hemodialysis will be randomized to receive 1 of 3 dialysate sodium prescriptions. The effects on blood pressure, interdialytic weight gain, thirst, and intradialytic symptoms will be assessed.
DOC.brief_title: Effect of Lowering the Dialysate Sodium on Blood Pressure in Hemodialysis Patients
DOC.criteria: patients on 3 times weekly hemodialysis of at least 3 months elevated average ambulatory blood pressures current dialysate sodium prescription 140mEq/L average predialysis serum sodium <140mEq/L frequent intradialytic hypotension estimated life expectancy <1 year nonadherence to dialysis prescription pregnancy inability or unwillingness to complete study measures
